content: lion brand pattern # 40720 *cvs-blanket pdf* skill level easy level 2 *some colors in original pattern have been discontinued * a 580-156 velvetspun yarn pastel green 3 balls b 580-106 velvetspun yarn bluebell 3 balls c 920-156 babysoft yarn pastel green 1 ball d 920-106 babysoft yarn pastel blue 1 ball crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm gauge square = 7½ inches x 7½ inches 19 x 19 cm work 13 motifs of square 1 12 motifs of square 2 25 squares total some rounds are worked with a single strand other rounds are worked with 2 strands of yarn join motifs in strips then join strips together as described in written pattern weave in ends to finish
